Package org.activebpel.rt.xml

Package which contains runtime components used by Active Endpoints plugins.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeMutableNamespaceContext Provides a way of resolving a namespace to a prefix or creating a new ns mapping.
IAeNamespaceContext This interface defines a standard expression namespace context.
 

Class Summary
AeElementBasedNamespaceContext A mutable namespace context implementation that uses a DOM Element to lookup and create namespace mappings.
AeXMLParserBase This class is a base for all those implementing a parse routine.
AeXMLParserDefaultHandler Implements a SAX DefaultHandler that resolves entities and optionally dispatches errors to a delegate error handler.
AeXMLParserErrorHandler Class used to process errors encountered during parse operation.
AeXMLParserSchemaHandler This class implements an XML parser default handler.
AeXMLToSimpleString This class extends the SAX DefaultHandler and is used to extract the core XML from an input stream.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.xml Description

Package which contains runtime components used by Active Endpoints plugins.

Contains runtime XML utility modules designed to be used by Active Endpoints plugins.
